channel.title: Help with playing client please!
channel.description: ok so, every time i log into my client, i logg in and its smooth upto this point... now when i go to click somewhere (a shop, a place on the map ect.) it randomly closes my client, but other friends that have played my client havnt had the same prob, so is it my computer, and if so, how do i fix please!?![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 19, 2009, 07:04:17 am[/size][hr]please help people!!!! :)
